mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_gslqlmhdzxf where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and lx = '路' AND zh Like 'Z%' order by zh

SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_gslqlmhdzxf where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and lx = '桥' AND zh Like 'Z%' order by zh

SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_gslqlmhdzxf where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and lx like '匝道' order by zh
SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_gslqlmhdzxf where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and lx like '%连接线%' and lx not like '%连接线桥%' and lx not like '%连接线隧道%' order by zh
SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_gslqlmhdzxf where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc} and lx like '%连接线桥%' order by zh
